vote
====

.. py:module:: vote


Classes
-------

.. autoapisummary::

   vote.ActivityVote
   vote.Vote


Module Contents
---------------

.. py:class:: ActivityVote(/, **data: Any)

   Bases: :py:obj:`pydantic.BaseModel`


   Individual vote for a single activity.

   Create a new model by parsing and validating input data from keyword arguments.

   Raises [`ValidationError`][pydantic_core.ValidationError] if the input data cannot be
   validated to form a valid model.

   `self` is explicitly positional-only to allow `self` as a field name.


   .. py:method:: validate_score(v)
      :classmethod:


      Ensure score is between 1 and 10.



   .. py:attribute:: activity_id
      :type:  int


   .. py:attribute:: score
      :type:  int


   .. py:attribute:: user_id
      :type:  int


.. py:class:: Vote(/, **data: Any)

   Bases: :py:obj:`pydantic.BaseModel`


   Simple voting: submit one or more activity votes.
   Each vote has a user_id, activity_id, and score (1-10).

   Create a new model by parsing and validating input data from keyword arguments.

   Raises [`ValidationError`][pydantic_core.ValidationError] if the input data cannot be
   validated to form a valid model.

   `self` is explicitly positional-only to allow `self` as a field name.


   .. py:method:: validate_no_duplicate_activities(v)
      :classmethod:


      Ensure user doesn't vote for the same activity twice.



   .. py:attribute:: votes
      :type:  List[ActivityVote]
